params.sqlcmd: "select " +" T_ODR_CTL.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"CUST_ODR_NO\\" as \\"CUST_ODR_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_ODR.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\" as \\"ODR_NO\\", " +" T_ODR_CTL.\\"CUST_ITEM_CD\\" as \\"CUST_ITEM_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_ODR.\\"ODR_QTY\\") as \\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"SHIP_PLAN_REMAIN_QTY\\" as \\"SHIP_PLAN_REMAIN_QTY\\", " +" to_char(T_ODR.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"DESINATED_SHIP_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_ODR.\\"SHIP_PLAN_REMAIN_QTY\\") as \\"DESINATED_SHIP_QTY\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"DEPO_TYP\\" as \\"DISPLAY_DEPO_TYP\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"PARTIAL_SHIP_INST_FLG\\" \\"PARTIAL_SHIP_INST_FLG\\", " +" T_ODR_CTL.\\"CUST_CD\\" as \\"CUST_CD\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"DLV_LOC_CD\\" as \\"DLV_LOC_CD\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_ODR.REMARKS as \\"REMARKS\\", " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_NAME, " +" M_ITEM.STOCK_UNIT as PKG_UNIT, " +" M_ITEM.UNIT_QTY_TYP, " +" M_CUST.CUST_NAME, " +" T_ODR_CTL.CUST_ITEM_NAME, " +" M_CUST_BASE.SHIP_WH_CD, " +" M_WH.PLANT_CD, " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC.JOB_ODR_CD " +"from " +" T_ODR_CTL, " +" T_ODR, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_CUST, " +" M_CUST_BASE, " +" M_WH, " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC " +"where " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" and T_ODR.\\"CUST_ODR_NO\\" like ? " +" and T_ODR.DESINATED_DLV_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"CUST_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"ITEM_CD\\" like ? " +" and(T_ODR.\\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\" like ? " +" or T_ODR.\\"ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD\\" like ?) " +" and T_ODR.\\"SHIP_PLAN_REMAIN_QTY\\" > 0 " +" and((T_ODR.\\"ODR_TYP\\" = 3 " +" and T_ODR.\\"DEPO_TYP\\" = '10') " +" or (T_ODR.\\"ODR_TYP\\" = 2 " +" and T_ODR.\\"DEPO_TYP\\" = '20')) " +" and T_ODR.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and T_ODR.\\"ODR_CTL_NO\\" = T_ODR_CTL.\\"ODR_CTL_NO\\" " +" and T_ODR_CTL.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" and M_CUST.COMPANY_CD = ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.CUST_CD = M_CUST.CUST_CD " +" and M_CUST_BASE.COMPANY_CD = ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.CUST_CD = M_CUST_BASE.CUST_CD " +" and T_ODR.DLV_LOC_CD = M_CUST_BASE.DLV_LOC_CD " +" and M_CUST_BASE.SHIP_WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD " +" and T_ODR.ODR_NO = T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC.ODR_NO(+) " +"order by " +" T_ODR_CTL.\\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_QTY\\""
"select " +" T_ODR.\\"SHIP_PLAN_REMAIN_QTY\\" as \\"SHIP_PLAN_REMAIN_QTY\\", " +" to_char(T_ODR.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_ODR " +"where " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ?"
"select " +" T_ANS_DLV_DATE.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_ANS_DLV_DATE " +"where " +" T_ANS_DLV_DATE.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" and T_ANS_DLV_DATE.\\"PART_DLV_SEQ_NO\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_ODR_CTL.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"CUST_ODR_NO\\" as \\"CUST_ODR_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_ODR.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\" as \\"ODR_NO\\", " +" T_ODR_CTL.\\"CUST_ITEM_CD\\" as \\"CUST_ITEM_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_ODR.\\"ODR_QTY\\") as \\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" to_char(T_ODR.\\"SHIP_PLAN_REMAIN_QTY\\") as \\"SHIP_PLAN_REMAIN_QTY\\", " +" to_char(T_ANS_DLV_DATE.\\"DESINATED_SHIP_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"DESINATED_SHIP_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_ANS_DLV_DATE.\\"DESINATED_SHIP_QTY\\") as \\"DESINATED_SHIP_QTY\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"DEPO_TYP\\" as \\"DISPLAY_DEPO_TYP\\", " +" to_char(T_ODR.\\"PARTIAL_SHIP_INST_FLG\\") as \\"PARTIAL_SHIP_INST_FLG\\", " +" to_char(T_ANS_DLV_DATE.\\"PART_DLV_SEQ_NO\\") as \\"PART_DLV_SEQ_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_ANS_DLV_DATE.\\"DESINATED_SHIP_QTY\\") as \\"BK_DESINATED_SHIP_QTY\\", " +" to_char(T_ANS_DLV_DATE.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_ODR_CTL.\\"CUST_CD\\" as \\"CUST_CD\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"DLV_LOC_CD\\" as \\"DLV_LOC_CD\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"REMARKS\\" as \\"REMARKS\\", " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_NAME, " +" M_ITEM.STOCK_UNIT as PKG_UNIT, " +" M_ITEM.UNIT_QTY_TYP, " +" M_CUST.CUST_NAME, " +" T_ODR_CTL.CUST_ITEM_NAME, " +" M_CUST_BASE.SHIP_WH_CD, " +" M_WH.PLANT_CD, " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC.JOB_ODR_CD " +"from " +" T_ODR_CTL, " +" T_ODR, " +" T_ANS_DLV_DATE, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_CUST, " +" M_CUST_BASE, " +" M_WH, " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC " +"where " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" and T_ODR.\\"CUST_ODR_NO\\" like ? " +" and T_ODR.DESINATED_DLV_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"CUST_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"ITEM_CD\\" like ? " +" and(T_ODR.\\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\" like ? " +" or T_ODR.\\"ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD\\" like ?) " +" and T_ODR.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and T_ANS_DLV_DATE.\\"DESINATED_SHIP_QTY\\" = T_ANS_DLV_DATE.\\"REST_SHIP_ODR_QTY\\" " +" and T_ODR.\\"ODR_CTL_NO\\" = T_ODR_CTL.\\"ODR_CTL_NO\\" " +" and T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\" = T_ANS_DLV_DATE.\\"ODR_NO\\" " +" and T_ODR_CTL.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" and M_CUST.COMPANY_CD = ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.CUST_CD = M_CUST.CUST_CD " +" and M_CUST_BASE.COMPANY_CD = ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.CUST_CD = M_CUST_BASE.CUST_CD " +" and T_ODR.DLV_LOC_CD = M_CUST_BASE.DLV_LOC_CD " +" and M_CUST_BASE.SHIP_WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD " +" and T_ODR.ODR_NO = T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC.ODR_NO(+) " +"order by " +" T_ODR_CTL.\\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_ANS_DLV_DATE.\\"DESINATED_SHIP_DATE\\""
"select " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"CODE\\" as \\"CODE\\" " +"from " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE " +"where " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"SYS_CLASS\\" = 'SALES' " +" and SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"CLASS_CODE\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"TRANSPORT_LT\\" as \\"TRANSPORT_LT\\" " +"from " +" M_CUST_BASE, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" M_CUST_BASE.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" and M_CUST_BASE.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CUST_BASE.\\"DLV_LOC_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" count(1) " +"from " +" T_ODR_CTL, " +" T_ODR, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_CUST, " +" M_CUST_BASE, " +" M_WH, " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC " +"where " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" and T_ODR.\\"CUST_ODR_NO\\" like ? " +" and T_ODR.DESINATED_DLV_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"CUST_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"ITEM_CD\\" like ? " +" and(T_ODR.\\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\" like ? " +" or T_ODR.\\"ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD\\" like ?) " +" and T_ODR.\\"SHIP_PLAN_REMAIN_QTY\\" > 0 " +" and((T_ODR.\\"ODR_TYP\\" = 3 " +" and T_ODR.\\"DEPO_TYP\\" = '10') " +" or (T_ODR.\\"ODR_TYP\\" = 2 " +" and T_ODR.\\"DEPO_TYP\\" = '20')) " +" and T_ODR.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and T_ODR.\\"ODR_CTL_NO\\" = T_ODR_CTL.\\"ODR_CTL_NO\\" " +" and T_ODR_CTL.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" and M_CUST.COMPANY_CD = ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.CUST_CD = M_CUST.CUST_CD " +" and M_CUST_BASE.COMPANY_CD = ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.CUST_CD = M_CUST_BASE.CUST_CD " +" and T_ODR.DLV_LOC_CD = M_CUST_BASE.DLV_LOC_CD " +" and M_CUST_BASE.SHIP_WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD " +" and T_ODR.ODR_NO = T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC.ODR_NO(+) " +" and ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"

"select " +" COUNT(1) " +"from " +" T_ODR_CTL, " +" T_ODR, " +" T_ANS_DLV_DATE, " +" M_ITEM, " +" M_CUST, " +" M_CUST_BASE, " +" M_WH, " +" T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC " +"where " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ? " +" and T_ODR.\\"CUST_ODR_NO\\" like ? " +" and T_ODR.DESINATED_DLV_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"CUST_CD\\" like ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"ITEM_CD\\" like ? " +" and(T_ODR.\\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\" like ? " +" or T_ODR.\\"ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD\\" like ?) " +" and T_ODR.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and T_ODR_CTL.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and T_ANS_DLV_DATE.\\"DESINATED_SHIP_QTY\\" = T_ANS_DLV_DATE.\\"REST_SHIP_ODR_QTY\\" " +" and T_ODR.\\"ODR_CTL_NO\\" = T_ODR_CTL.\\"ODR_CTL_NO\\" " +" and T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\" = T_ANS_DLV_DATE.\\"ODR_NO\\" " +" and T_ODR_CTL.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" and M_CUST.COMPANY_CD = ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.CUST_CD = M_CUST.CUST_CD " +" and M_CUST_BASE.COMPANY_CD = ? " +" and T_ODR_CTL.CUST_CD = M_CUST_BASE.CUST_CD " +" and T_ODR.DLV_LOC_CD = M_CUST_BASE.DLV_LOC_CD " +" and M_CUST_BASE.SHIP_WH_CD = M_WH.WH_CD " +" and T_ODR.ODR_NO = T_JOB_ODR_ODR_ALC.ODR_NO(+) " +" and ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"

cell.name: r1_STS_TYP
cell.description: ラジオボタン（出荷未計画）

cell.name: r2_STS_TYP
cell.description: ラジオボタン（出荷計画済）
